Title: Relates to prior authorization and payments from the medical indemnity fund
Summary: Requires any regulation that mandates prior authorization to establish a mechanism for submission of requests for prior authorization by health care providers directly to the medical indemnity fund; requires the medical indemnity fund administrator to notify qualified plaintiffs which costs are qualifying health care costs to be paid from the fund and which are not within a reasonably prompt period of time.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prior authorization and payments from the medical indemnity fund
